name: whatsapp-reader
description: Read messages from WhatsApp Web chats and summarize learnings (Baileys session)

tools.name: read_whatsapp_chat_messages_tool
tools.description: Read messages from a WhatsApp chat or group by name or chat_id

chat_name.description: Chat/group name to match (e.g. my-ai-ml or #my-ai-ml)

tools.name: summarize_whatsapp_chat_learnings_tool
tools.description: Read messages from a WhatsApp chat and summarize key learnings

setup: Run /whatsapp login in Jotty CLI first (same session). Then use /run to read and summarize a chat.
